## MemoryCookieStore.getAllCookies() method

Gets all the cookies in the store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllCookies(callback: Callback<Cookie[]>): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

A function to call when all the cookies have been retrieved or an error occurs.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

- Cookies SHOULD be returned in creation order to preserve sorting via [cookieCompare()](./tough-cookie.cookiecompare.md)<!-- -->.
